Member Function Documentation

void TLightKit::ChangePosition ( double  newAzimuth,
double  newZenith,
double  newDistance 
)

Changes the light position to azimuth, zenith, and distance from the scene centre. Azimuth and Zenith are in radians.

See also:
redo().

References azimuth, distance, UpdateSunPosition(), and zenith.

void TLightKit::ChangePosition ( QDateTime  newTime,
double  longitude,
double  latitude 
)

Computes the sun position local coordinates for the longitude and latitude in the newTime. The light is positioned at these coordinates. longitude and latitude are in degrees.

References azimuth, cSunCoordinates::dAzimuth, tgc::Degree, cSunCoordinates::dZenithAngle, m_latitude, m_longitude, m_time, sunpos(), UpdateSunPosition(), and zenith.

Referenced by LightDialog::GetTLightKit(), CmdLightPositionModified::redo(), CmdLightKitModified::redo(), CmdLightPositionModified::undo(), and CmdLightKitModified::undo().
